name: Dungeon Form Tycoon
description:
You have been appointed as overseer by the adventures guild on the main land to construct and develop a dungeon hub with supporting infrastructure on some small islands. 

  • Place buildings to generate rating, gold and happiness. 
  • Upgrade building to give different bonus effects. 
  • Craft weapons and potions for adventuring in your own custom dungeons.
  • Construct your own dungeon full of monsters that you can adventure into yourself. 

This game is a tycoon styled manager sim where the main goal to to complete objectives and make the islands a success.

Created gradually over 7 - 8 months as a side project by proTaleDev (Joshua Boswell). Please enjoy and have fun.
